00030 #ifndef SC_RUNNABLE_H
00031 #define SC_RUNNABLE_H
00032 
00033 
00034 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_process.h"
00035 
00036 namespace sc_core {
00037 
00038 //=============================================================================
00039 //  CLASS : sc_runnable
00040 //
00041 //  Class that manages the ready-to-run queues.
00042 //=============================================================================
00043 
00044 class SC_API sc_runnable
00045 {
00046 
00047   public:
00048     sc_runnable();
00049     ~sc_runnable();
00050 
00051     inline void init();
00052     inline void toggle_methods();
00053     inline void toggle_threads();
00054 
00055     inline void remove_method( sc_method_handle );
00056     inline void remove_thread( sc_thread_handle );
00057 
00058     inline void execute_method_next( sc_method_handle );
00059     inline void execute_thread_next( sc_thread_handle );
00060 
00061     inline void push_back_method( sc_method_handle );
00062     inline void push_back_thread( sc_thread_handle );
00063     inline void push_front_method( sc_method_handle );
00064     inline void push_front_thread( sc_thread_handle );
00065 
00066     inline bool is_initialized() const;
00067     inline bool is_empty() const;
00068 
00069     inline sc_method_handle pop_method();
00070     inline sc_thread_handle pop_thread();
00071 
00072   public: // diagnostics:
00073     void dump() const;
00074 
00075   private:
00076     sc_method_handle m_methods_push_head;
00077     sc_method_handle m_methods_push_tail;
00078     sc_method_handle m_methods_pop;
00079     sc_thread_handle m_threads_push_head;
00080     sc_thread_handle m_threads_push_tail;
00081     sc_thread_handle m_threads_pop;
00082 
00083   private:
00084     // disabled
00085     sc_runnable( const sc_runnable& );
00086     sc_runnable& operator = ( const sc_runnable& );
00087 };
00088 
00089 } // namespace sc_core
00090 
00091 #endif
